content.text:
Let me analyze the structure and provide assembly instructions:

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure consists of two separate constructions side by side
- Left structure: Has 5 layers (bottom to top: red arch base, blue cube, green block, red arch top, orange roof)
- Right structure: Has 4 layers (bottom to top: red double arch base, red circular frame, two yellow horizontal blocks)
- Total blocks used: Approximately 10-11 blocks

Block Selection from Dictionary:
Left Structure (from bottom up):
- Red arch base: Block #3
- Blue cube: Block #6
- Green horizontal block: Block #7
- Red arch top with sides: Block #5
- Orange triangular roof pieces: Block #15 and #16

Right Structure (from bottom up):
- Red double arch base: Block #2
- Red circular frame: Block #4
- Yellow horizontal blocks: Block #11 and #12

Assembly Order:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 3
    Step2: Move block with index 6
    Step3: Move block with index 7
    Step4: Move block with index 5
    Step5: Move block with index 15
    Step6: Move block with index 16
    Step7: Move block with index 2
    Step8: Move block with index 4
    Step9: Move block with index 11
    Step10: Move block with index 12
}

The assembly begins with the left structure from the ground up, followed by the right structure. Each component is placed precisely to match the orientation shown in the dictionary images.
